title: Red on Red
author: VD
content_html:
Ben Shapiro has reportedly fired Candace Owens from The Daily Wire, presumably for insufficient philosemitism.

I continue not to care what these manufactured anti-American narrative massagers think, say, or do.

UPDATE: No worries, the grifting will continue!
